== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&frac12;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00bd/index.htm U+000BD].
  * `&frac12` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00bd/index.htm U+000BD].
